Description: Amuletic pendant charm in the form of a green plastic "hand" to which are attached, by metal rings, four further charms including fish and a hand.
Curator's comments: Eth.Doc.120. Purchased at mulid of al-Hussein, Cairo, Nov.1990.
Acquisition notes: Af1991,06.1 to 5 were purchased from Delia Pemberton. All the objects are recorded in the purchase book as having been purchased by the vendor in Cairo, Luxor or Abydos in November 1990. See Eth.Doc.120.
